review_text: I was expecting this movie to be bombed. Trailer was disaster. Acting: aamir and mr bacchan was as usual good, Katrina Kaif still can't act, and that's it. look like people need mrs kaif only as an item girl. Music: just ignore. Action: meh. Desi POTC. And garibo ka Johnny depp jumping from here and there, try to do some impossible stunts. Thank god my cousin paid for my ticket.
